DescriptionText.Text: Word's getting around about us. I've heard from another group of survivors who'd like to join us. - %1$s

SummaryText.Text: Other survivors want to join us.

DescriptionText.Text: Thought you'd want to know I made it. I met up with some good people. I have a new home now. - %1$s
Has a new home.
Thought you were hot shit kicking me out, right? Well, it turns out I don't need you assholes. - %1$s
Has a new home.
Thought you'd want to know I made it. I met up with some good people. I have a new home now. - %1$s
Has a new home.
I encountered a new group of survivors. They're barely hanging on. - %1$s
New neighbor.
New neighbor.
New neighbor.
Good supply of FOOD in their location.
Good supply of MEDICINE in their location.
Good supply of AMMO in their location.
Good supply of MATERIALS in their location.
Good supply of FUEL in their location.
Adam came home with bites ... huge bites ... I don't know how he even made it home. His clothes were bright red. Within a few minutes, he had bled out on the living room floor.

SummaryText.Text: It's down to just Lily and me.

NameText.Text: JOURNAL: Can we even do this?

DescriptionText.Text: Adam was so GOOD at everything. It's like he was made for this life. And now he's dead, like all the others. I can't do this anymore. Not with Lily sick all the time. There has to be another way.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: Trying to Make a SURVEY MISSION!

TutorialText.Text: We have the highest possible illness prevention chance.

DescriptionText.Text: Must be a strong bug to get past our medical protocols. With our facilities I expect a speedy recovery. - Lily

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: We can't let our guard down with illness. We can't afford folks getting sick around here.

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: Hopefully it's just a cold and not something worse. We should look into upgrading our medical facilities.

TutorialText.Text: Build an Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: It seems to be going around. We really need some medical facilities to help us fight off illness.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: ==== Mercy Shot Mission Roll - Fail ====
LOG: ==== Mercy Shot Mission Roll - Success ====

DescriptionText.Text: It looks like we're stopping here. That last horde we ran into did something to the engine, and now it's completely burned itself out. Beyond repair. No choice now but to settle down here and figure out what our options are ...

SummaryText.Text: We're going to need to find shelter soon.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: Trying to Make a SURVEY MISSION!

TutorialText.Text: We have the highest possible illness prevention chance.

DescriptionText.Text: Must be a strong bug to get past our medical protocols. With our facilities I expect a speedy recovery. - Lily

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: We can't let our guard down with illness. We can't afford folks getting sick around here.

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: Hopefully it's just a cold and not something worse. We should look into upgrading our medical facilities.

TutorialText.Text: Build an Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: It seems to be going around. We really need some medical facilities to help us fight off illness.

Console_Command.Command: LOG: ==== Mercy Shot Mission Roll - Fail ====
LOG: ==== Mercy Shot Mission Roll - Success ====

DescriptionText.Text: We've found a place to stay that seems sturdy enough ... for the moment.

SummaryText.Text: We've found a place to stay.

DescriptionText.Text: The RV is prepped and ready to go. Now it's up to us ... how long do we want to stay here before shipping out? Everyone is ready to drop what they're doing and run if we give the order.

SummaryText.Text: We can leave at any time.

DescriptionText.Text: We found a run-down RV on the outskirts of town. It might just be what we need to carry a few people and enough supplies to make it to safety.

SummaryText.Text: We found a run-down RV on the outskirts of town.

TutorialText.Text: We have the highest possible illness prevention chance.

DescriptionText.Text: Must be a strong bug to get past our medical protocols. With our facilities I expect a speedy recovery. - Lily

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: We can't let our guard down with illness. We can't afford folks getting sick around here.

TutorialText.Text: Upgrade our Infirmary to reduce the chances of getting sick.

DescriptionText.Text: Hopefully it's just a cold and not something worse. We should look into upgrading our medical facilities.

DescriptionText.Text: It seems to be going around. We really need some medical facilities to help us fight off illness.
